name: AFI Compare to Aroma Fresh & Clean F21610
description: Compare to Aroma Fresh & Clean F21610, this fragrance oil presents a luscious blend of elegant green herbs that cascade vibrantly, creating a refreshing and invigorating aroma. The top notes reveal a crisp citrus essence, complemented by a subtle musk base that adds depth and warmth to the overall fragrance. With its combination of greens, citrus, and musk, this scent embodies freshness and cleanliness. Whether used in body wash, candles, incense, shampoo, or soap, it provides a revitalizing experience.
